ssot__Lead__dlm.name: Lead
ssot__Lead__dlm.description: The Lead DMO represents a person or company that shows interest in another company's products or services.

ssot__AnnualRevenue__c.description: The annual revenue for the lead’s company.

ssot__City__c.description: The city of the lead’s address.

ssot__ContactAddressId__c.description: The reference ID of the lead’s address.

ssot__ContactPointEmailId__c.description: The reference ID of the lead’s email address.

ssot__ConvertedDate__c.description: The date that the lead was converted.

ssot__ConvertedToAccountId__c.description: The reference ID that points to the account into which the lead has been converted.

ssot__ConvertedToAccountContactId__c.description: The reference ID that points to the account contact into which the lead has been converted.

ssot__ConvertedToOpportunityId__c.description: The reference ID that points to the opportunity into which the lead has been converted.

ssot__CountryId__c.description: The reference ID of the country where the address is located.

ssot__CountryName__c.description: The free text name of the country where the address is located.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__CurrencyId__c.description: The reference ID for a currency code.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: The reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: The reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record originated, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__EmailBouncedDate__c.description: The lead’s email bounced, if applicable.

ssot__EmailBouncedReason__c.description: The reason the bounce occurred, if applicable.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: The reference ID for an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: The reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__FaxContactPhoneId__c.description: The reference ID for the lead’s fax number.

ssot__GeoAccuracy__c.description: Additional information about the latitude and longitude attributes of an address.

ssot__GeoLatitude__c.description: The geographical latitude for the address.

ssot__GeoLongitude__c.description: The geographical longitude for the address.

ssot__IndustryId__c.description: The reference ID for the lead’s industry.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: The reference ID for the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__IsConverted__c.description: An indicator if the lead was converted.

ssot__LastActivityDate__c.description: The date of the most recent account activity.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the lead DMO.

ssot__PartyRoleId__c.description: The reference ID to the associated party role, for example, a customer, supplier, or competitor.

ssot__LeadRating__c.description: A lead’s rating, for example, cold or warm.

ssot__LeadScore__c.description: A score or value assigned by Einstein logic.

ssot__LeadSourceId__c.description: The reference ID to the source of the lead.

ssot__LeadStatusId__c.description: The reference ID to the status of the lead.

ssot__MobileContactPhoneId__c.description: The reference ID to the lead’s mobile phone number.

ssot__PartnerAccountId__c.description: The reference ID to the partner who found the lead.

ssot__PhoneContactPointId__c.description: The reference ID for the lead’s phone number.

ssot__PhotoURL__c.description: A link to a lead’s photo.

ssot__PostalCodeId__c.description: The reference ID for the postal code.

ssot__StateProvinceId__c.description: The reference ID for the state or prince where the address is located.

ssot__StateProvinceName__c.description: The state or province name where the address is located.

ssot__StreetName__c.description: The lead’s address street number and name.
